content: Last updated: April 2025 Hey there! If Microsoft Office is giving you trouble, start here. This means you do not have a license to that supports the Microsoft Office! ğŸ‘‰ Reach out to #digital-workplace to confirm your license is showing for your account. âœ… Once Confirmed Quit the app Sign back in! ğŸ‘‰ Use your full email + password (FastPass wonâ€™t work here) ğŸ”„ Apps Not Updating?
